description:
Whether you're smashing powdery pillows, or slicing down groomed lines, these mitts will keep your hands warm and dry. Interchangeable liners let you quickly adapt to the thermometer reading outside.

  • VarioShell 3-layer fabric with Dry-Tex waterproof membrane keep hands dry and comfotable
  • Thermolite® Micro synthetic insulation in the liner is bluesign approved, 300g on the backs, 140g on the palm
  • Durable synthetic suede palm provides grip
  • Soft brushed polyester microfleece removable liner
  • Adjustable wrist straps for a secure fit
  • DWR finish sheds moisture to keep your hands warm and dry
  • Pairing clips to keep them together when you're not wearing them
  • Compatible with the MEC T2 Warmer and T3 Warmest Insulated Liner Mitts.(sold separately)
name: MEC T2 Warmer Ski System Mitt - Unisex
